topic.title: How do I make more than one zeroID?
topic.body: I go to Zeroid, but it says I already have one... but how do I create more than one? For obvious reasons.

14_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body: Found it from i2p reddit post

1_1M6scJRBJiCnXTM4wPKK6gAGHzs9HMbf4V.body:
It didn't work. As far as the one @nofish suggested. I did enable multiuser, and it did show ZeroProxy activated. But ZeroID would only ask to make a new Cert, and it wouldn't even let me do that.

Where in the user.json do I put the master seed? Also how do I paste two Certs in the json?

My isp doesn't block requests, more than likely I'm doing something wrong :P 

Could you do screenshots or something to explain it in more details how to do the master_seed and how to have more than one cert in the json file?

There we go! 

but.. How can I get it to remember my other master_seed? It doesn't remember the second one, does it?
